scene_description: Hero character at edge of cliff overlooking vast fantasy landscape

structured_prompt.short_description: A hero character stands at the edge of a cliff, contemplating the vast fantasy landscape before them, with a mix of determination and apprehension on their face

objects.description: The hero character, centered in the frame, wearing practical travel attire with a backpack and walking stick, and a contemplative facial expression
objects.shape_and_color: Earthy tones for attire, contrasting with vibrant landscape colors
objects.texture: fabric of backpack and clothing, and the rough texture of the cliff
objects.appearance_details: contemplative expression with a mix of determination and apprehension, and open body language
objects.pose: standing with one foot slightly forward, conveying readiness to step into the unknown
objects.orientation: facing the landscape, with a slight inclination of the head

structured_prompt.background_setting: A vast, expansive fantasy landscape with a mix of vibrant and earthy tones, stretching out to the horizon

lighting.conditions: Soft, golden hour lighting with a warm color temperature
lighting.direction: 45-degree angle to the hero's face, slightly above eye level
lighting.shadow: soft, gentle shadows that minimize harsh lines and add to the serene atmosphere

aesthetics.composition: Rule of thirds, with the horizon line placed to create a balanced frame
aesthetics.color_scheme: Teal/Orange contrast, with earthy tones for the cliff and hero's attire, and vibrant warm colors for the landscape
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: Contemplative, serene, and ominous, with a sense of adventure and uncertainty

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: f/5.6, to create a moderate depth of field that separates the hero from the landscape
photographic_characteristics.focus: sharp on the hero, with a slight softening of the landscape in the background
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: slightly above eye level, looking up at the hero to create a sense of vulnerability

simple_prompt: A hero character stands at the edge of a cliff, contemplating the vast fantasy landscape before them, with a mix of determination and apprehension on their face. Camera: slightly above eye level, looking up at the hero to create a sense of vulnerability. Lens: 50mm. Lighting: Soft, golden hour lighting with a warm color temperature
